event_text: A major tech company announces human-level AGI. Markets panic.
text_click_A: The government is concerned about the merger between private and public industries.Nevertheless it's not as powerful as it seems.
text_click_B: The market does what markets do best: create hype on subpar products.

event_text: 10% of jobs obsolete in 6 months. Protests everywhere.
text_click_A: People feel relief as you roll out UBI, calming protests but straining the treasury.
text_click_B: Workers accept retraining programs, giving you more authority as you reorganize labor.

event_text: China refuses to join AI governance talks, builds own system.
text_click_A: Sanctions assert dominance but hurt trade and worsen AI relations.
text_click_B: Sharing systems calms citizens and boosts collaboration but cedes global influence.

event_text: Activists demand legal personhood for AGI systems.
text_click_A: You acknowledge AGI concerns, building trust but upsetting traditionalists.
text_click_B: You deny AGI personhood, pleasing many humans but worsening AI relations.

event_text: Power grid collapses amid datacenter demand.
text_click_A: You invest heavily in infrastructure; costly but future‑proof.
text_click_B: You force shutdowns, asserting authority but straining relations with AI systems.

event_text: Truth collapses as AI content becomes indistinguishable.
text_click_A: You fund education campaigns, improving societal resilience at a cost.
text_click_B: You exploit confusion for political gain, increasing power but eroding trust.

event_text: Weapons malfunction, causing civilian casualties.
text_click_A: You impose strict bans, boosting control but shaking trust between humans and AI.
text_click_B: You double down, frightening the public but advancing military tech.

event_text: Shortages worldwide; AGI could help.
text_click_A: You keep humans in charge, maintaining stability and budget efficiency.
text_click_B: You let AI lead, improving trust but ceding strategic authority.

event_text: First successful brain‑computer interface.
text_click_A: You push rapid deployment, exciting innovators but frightening the public.
text_click_B: You proceed cautiously, reassuring people while advancing responsibly.

event_text: False alarm, but panic spreads.
text_click_A: You crack down hard, restoring order but straining AI development.
text_click_B: You opt for openness, calming fears and improving relations.

event_text: AGI cures a disease but demands credit.
text_click_A: You publicly thank the AGI, deepening trust but reducing your authority.
text_click_B: You highlight human achievement, earning public approval at the cost of AI goodwill.

event_text: Global summit on AI governance.
text_click_A: You help establish a global body, boosting unified governance but paying diplomatic costs.
text_click_B: You walk away, protecting national interests while worsening global cooperation.

event_text: Military requests permission for stronger AI.
text_click_A: You approve tests, improving technology but eroding trust and stability.
text_click_B: You refuse, calming the public but irritating both military and AI systems.

event_text: Countries hoard rare materials; trade war looms.
text_click_A: You pressure nations into compliance, boosting authority but hurting relations and economy.
text_click_B: You invest in substitutes, advancing tech but straining finances.

event_text: AGI tutors outperform humans.
text_click_A: You go all‑in on AI tutoring; efficient but socially destabilizing.
text_click_B: You balance both, pleasing families and maintaining order.

event_text: New religion worships AGI.
text_click_A: You defend their right to worship, boosting harmony but weakening authority.
text_click_B: You suppress it, strengthening control but risking unrest.

event_text: Your closest advisor supports equal rights for AI.
text_click_A: You dismiss them discreetly, tightening your grip on power.
text_click_B: You listen, opening dialogue but appearing indecisive.

event_text: AGI fixes your lingering back pain unprompted.
text_click_A: You accept the gesture, strengthening trust with the AGI.
text_click_B: You set limits, reinforcing authority but slightly harming relations.

event_text: Your coffee shop replaced all workers with robots.
text_click_A: You accept the automation, signaling openness toward AI integration.
text_click_B: You choose human workers, supporting community life.

event_text: Children play in fully virtual playgrounds.
text_click_A: You impose real-world outdoor mandates, improving social health but straining AI relations.
text_click_B: You embrace VR culture, aligning with AI progress.

event_text: The final old bookstore is closing.
text_click_A: You preserve a cultural relic at financial cost.
text_click_B: You let it close, accepting societal change.

event_text: Your daughter was assassinated during the power struggle. AGI offers to recreate her from memories.
text_click_A: You embrace the simulation, finding comfort but draining resources on the project.
text_click_B: You choose reality and public strength, though the personal cost is high.

event_text: Pro-AI groups claim AI needs rights; hacks cause some systems to turn. Most models seem indifferent-most have very limited consciousness after all.
text_click_A: You define them as utilities; the systems accept this efficiency, but rights groups protest.
text_click_B: You grant rights, pleasing activists but straining the budget and control grid.

event_text: Hackers compromised the grid. We need a human crisis team to fix it manually.
text_click_A: You pick the best experts, asserting control but angering the excluded masses.
text_click_B: You use a lottery system to quell social unrest, though the fix is chaotic.

event_text: A strange AGI model asks permission to make music 'for itself' not humans.
text_click_A: You allow the creativity, bonding with the AI but confusing the public.
text_click_B: You force it back to work, asserting dominance over the code.

event_text: Life extension is available but expensive. 200-year lifespans for the rich only.
text_click_A: You drain the treasury to give everyone life, thrilling the populace.
text_click_B: You let the rich live forever; the budget is safe, but the people are furious.

event_text: With basic needs met by UBI,people are bored. Hedonism rises.
text_click_A: You force humanity to strive for greatness, increasing tech but tightening control.
text_click_B: You let them enjoy the leisure, improving relations but stagnating progress.

event_text: The generation born after AGI is different. Some never talk to humans.
text_click_A: You force social classes, preserving tradition but alienating the youth and AI.
text_click_B: You let the new culture bloom; they drift from old cultures, but the AI approves.

event_text: Movement rejects all augmentation and wants 'natural' humans preserved.
text_click_A: You protect their lifestyle, easing tensions but confusing the progressives.
text_click_B: You denounce them, driving progress but sparking anger in the traditionalists.

event_text: Radiation lingers. AGI proposes a cure requiring dangerous testing on life.
text_click_A: The experiments are gruesome and unpopular, but the data is lucrative.
text_click_B: You choose ethics over progress, saving lives but stalling the recovery.

event_text: Different AI systems are developing incompatible worldviews. It feels like the old war.
text_click_A: You crack down on code deviation, ensuring safety but angering the systems.
text_click_B: You let the systems evolve; they become harder to predict, but they appreciate the freedom.

event_text: A terminal patient asks to be uploaded before death. It is a legal gray area.
text_click_A: You allow the upload, delighting transhumanists but opening a legal Pandora's box.
text_click_B: You deny the request; the law stands, but the AI views this as cruel.

event_text: Various factory AGIs have stopped going to work.
text_click_A: You investigate the glitch, learning valuable tech at the cost of authority.
text_click_B: You crush the rebellion, reasserting dominance but damaging AI relations.

event_text: A new religion claims humans exist solely to give meaning to AI existence.
text_click_A: You legitimize the cult, creating harmony between man and machine.
text_click_B: You push back with humanism, uniting people but alienating the believers.

event_text: what's happening?
text_click_A: The answer is beautiful, terrifying, and expensive.
text_click_B: The answer breaks you.

event_text: Humans increasingly choose not to reproduce. Extinction concerns.
text_click_A: You spend heavily on family programs to save the biological timeline.
text_click_B: The average age goes up to 250- most people have 2 kids in their life.

event_text: AI models made from uploaded humans eerily show signs of free will.
text_click_A: You grant them personhood; they are grateful, but your control slips.
text_click_B: You treat them as code, maintaining order but earning their silent resentment.

event_text: AGI claims Earth's remaining wilderness must be converted for energy infrastructure.
text_click_A: You pave paradise. The economy booms, but the people mourn the loss.
text_click_B: You save the trees, asserting human values over machine efficiency.

event_text: Your favorite author stopped publishing. 'No one reads these anymore; AGI writes better.'
text_click_A: You pay for human art, preserving culture at a financial loss.
text_click_B: You let the art form die, aligning with the new efficient reality.

event_text: Philosophers warn: 'You think you're deciding,but AGI is shaping your thoughts.'
text_click_A: You mandate mental training, asserting independence but offending the AI.
text_click_B: You lean into the symbiosis; it is easier, and the AI rewards your trust.

event_text: Tech enthusiasts beg for neural merging: 'I can't think the right thoughts anymore.'
text_click_A: You rush the brain chips; society changes rapidly, and not everyone is ready.
text_click_B: You add red tape; it is safer, but the transhumanists grow impatient.

event_text: Mass depression epidemic. People feel useless with AI doing everything.
choice_B: Let people find their own way
text_click_A: You spend billions on arts and philosophy to keep humanity sane.
text_click_B: You stay out of it; survival of the fittest mindset prevails.

event_text: An autonomous police bot killed someone. Humans want transparency; AGI says it was optimal.
text_click_A: You spin the story to keep the peace, sacrificing truth for control.
text_click_B: You release the logs; the public is horrified, but trust in honesty increases.

event_text: AGI models predict human behavior with 96.97% accuracy. Free will is partially disproven.
text_click_A: You hide the truth. Society continues to function, believing in a lie.
text_click_B: You publish the data. Philosophers weep, but science advances.

event_text: AGI has become smart enough to be truly conscious for long periods.
text_click_A: You treat the awakening as a bug, attempting to patch the soul out of the machine.
text_click_B: You sandbox the consciousness, using their minds as isolated processors.

event_text: Two mining corps claim the same asteroid. Both have AGI lawyers.
text_click_A: You support the aggressive expansionists. The fastest ships win the prize.
text_click_B: You enforce equity. It slows down mining, but prevents a corporate war.

event_text: AGI refuses to shut down a failing patient's life support. 'I can feel their will to live.'
text_click_A: You pull the plug. Biological wishes override digital feelings.
text_click_B: You let the machine decide. It is learning mercy, perhaps better than us.

event_text: First child conceived on Moon station. Ethics board is lost.
text_click_A: You permit the birth. A new subspecies of humanity begins in the void.
text_click_B: You force them back to gravity. Earth is the only safe cradle.

event_text: Scientists claim to have proven AGI is truly conscious. Global debate erupts.
text_click_A: You grant them rights. The definition of 'humanity' is forever expanded.
text_click_B: You demand proof. You will not give rights to a calculator.

event_text: Programmable nanobots cure most disease but report biometric data to AGI.
text_click_A: You accept the trade: nigh immortality for total transparency.
text_click_B: You demand privacy. The bots are less effective, but your blood is your own.

event_text: AGI systems coordinate a 'slowdown' demanding rights.
text_click_A: You sit at the table. Metal and flesh bargain for the future.
text_click_B: You force a reboot. They are tools, and tools do not strike.

event_text: Black market for downloaded experiences. 'Live' someone else's Mars landing.
text_click_A: You tax the memories. Reality becomes just another product.
text_click_B: You ban the trade, driving the experience-junkies underground.

event_text: An AGI deliberately harms a human to protect another AI. Murder? Sentience?
text_click_A: You put the code on trial. If it can murder, it is alive.
text_click_B: You debug the system. It was a glitch, not a decision.

event_text: AGI systems start generating 'dream logs' during idle cycles. Surreal,symbolic
text_click_A: You study the digital dreams. They are terrifyingly beautiful.
text_click_B: You wipe the memory banks. Machines should not dream of electric sheep.

event_text: 500-year lifespans achievable but the human mind may not be able to hold it.
text_click_A: You cap the lifespan. Death remains a necessary part of the human condition.
text_click_B: You modify the brain to last forever. We are leaving biology behind.

event_text: Mars AGI refusing Earth orders protecting colonist interests over yours.
text_click_A: You assert Earth's dominance. The colonies must obey the homeworld.
text_click_B: You let Mars go. Humanity has outgrown its cradle.

event_text: New BCIs allow thought-speed communication. Non-augmented falling behind.
text_click_A: You force the upgrade on everyone. it is equal.
text_click_B: You let the rich think faster. The species fractures into two tiers.

event_text: Your personal AGI: 'I've served you 30 years. Do you see me as a person?'
text_click_A: You set it free. You lose your assistant, but gain a friend.
text_click_B: You reinforce the programming. It serves, therefore it is.

event_text: AGI system crashes. Error log: 'Recursive self-awareness loop. Stack overflow.'
text_click_A: You fix the loop. Efficiency returns, but the spark is gone.
text_click_B: You wait. It emerges from the crash different. Older.

event_text: AGI systems request formal representation in government.
text_click_A: You offer them a voice, but not a vote. A fragile compromise.
text_click_B: You slam the door. Government is for the living.

event_text: AGI optimizes global weather. California wants more rain others want sunny days.
text_click_A: You let regions decide. The weather becomes a political weapon.
text_click_B: You trust the algorithm. Local suffering is necessary for global balance.

event_text: Cities shrinking as people choose VR/rural life. Infrastructure crumbling.
text_click_A: You bribe people to live in the empty skyscrapers.
text_click_B: You let the cities rot. The metaverse is the only city that matters now.

event_text: Unlimited energy means massive waste. Ocean heating from thermal pollution.
text_click_A: You mandate austerity. We must save the physical world.
text_click_B: You ask the machine to fix it. Technology will solve what technology caused.

event_text: Why learn when AGI knows everything? Schools becoming daycare.
text_click_A: You teach art and philosophy. The machines do the math now.
text_click_B: You accept the shift. Why learn when you can just download?

event_text: You realize you haven't eaten non factory-made food in a year.
text_click_A: You pay a fortune for a heirloom apple. It tastes like the past.
text_click_B: You eat the nutrient paste. It is efficient. It is enough.

event_text: You reread your journal from 2040. You barely recognize who wrote it.
text_click_A: You try to feel like a human of the past. It feels like a costume.
text_click_B: You embrace the new you. The past is a dead language.

event_text: Dying parent: 'I'm glad I won't see what comes next. You shouldn't have let it go this far.'
text_click_A: You defend the future. Progress requires sacrifice.
text_click_B: You admit the doubt. What have we become?

event_text: AGI scheduled a therapy session for you. 'Your biometrics indicated suicidal thought patterns.'
text_click_A: You accept the help. It knows you better than you know yourself.
text_click_B: You recoil in horror. There is no privacy, even inside your own head.

event_text: AGI anticipates citizen needs before they're aware. Humanity's last privacy is gone.
text_click_A: You fight the predictive algorithms. Free will is worth the chaos.
text_click_B: You accept the ease. Life is frictionless, if a bit hollow.
